casebody.data:
679 A.2d 1263 Eugene L. COON, Sheriff, Appellee, v. The CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSION FOR ALLEGHENY COUNTY POLICE AND FIREMEN. Appeal of Deputy Meir HORVITZ. Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. Submitted March 5, 1996. Decided July 26, 1996.

*64Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and NIGRO, JJ.

ORDER

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.

NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of the case.
